abstract.t: This document describes several solution scenarios that use IPFIX Mediators and defines a reference internal process model. An IPFIX Mediator is an intermediate node between IPFIX Devices and traffic Collectors. This node acts as a IPFIX proxy or IPFIX concentrator. IPFIX Mediator has several capabilities such as storage function of original Flow Records, flexible aggregation function, and proper distribution function for collector or analyzer. The combination of these capabilities can solve several problems related to traffic monitoring.
